Iâ€™ve been experimenting with various different tools recently and for speed required smaller but representative data from my current project. Here are two ways of getting every nth line of an array (python) or dataframe (R):

Python: # assume n = 10 resampled_array = array[0::10]

R: # assume n = 10 Nth.row <- function(dataframe, n) dataframe[(seq (n, to=nrow(dataframe), by=n)),] resampled_df <- Nth.row(df, 10)

Tags: python, R, resample, skip rows, array, dataframe
